post.body: I'm TOTALLY watching WNTW also!!! I include a 'surprise' wish in my daily prayer.
Wish I was able to make a road trip right now. How are the meds going?
*GAG*
I just started it today :)
Thank you!!! I am so excited about it! I stocked up tonight on some great WW-worthy foods :)
Thank you!! It was amazing and I'm SO excited!
It's called Momentum. The Flex and Core are gone. Not fully sure what the new one is all about. I'll find out tonight.
I'm going to meetings. HAVE to. I don't think that online will work for me. That's what Mel's doing too :) Let me know !!!
YAAAAAY MEL!!!!!
You won't regret it! We love ours, especially for dog hair! It's a great investment.
LOVE this, but I'm not sure how to create a new .php?!?! Any hints?
Yours looks much nicer than the Snuggie though!!! https://www.freesnuggie.com/?mid=523259
Thank you!!!!
Shore :)
Oooh, SEVERAL cute styles at Etsy! http://tinyurl.com/8f5s62
First Weight Watchers meeting in 2 days!!! BTW, can onyone from WWtweets tell me how to post to the group here?
What a great day when everything is done and I get to play games with the girls. They, too, are so happy! :)
House is solely lit by 3,000 twinkle lights. Inside. Patiently waiting for all neighbors to show for Christmas Party. Tequila on counter.
Carpets are cleaned, tummy is full, and I'm whooped. Is 7:30 too early for bed?
Just read Roni's review on the Momentum program. Can't wait to go to Weight Watchers on Tuesday!
Up WAY too early. With energy. What the heck is going on???
Next Tuesday I'm signing up for Weight Watchers meetings. I haven't been to meetings since Meggie was a baby. haven't succeeded since then
Watching The Chronicals of Narnia: Prince Caspian. Never seen a sequel as good.
Painted the trim in almost the entire house today. Finishing tomorrow. Quite the busy little thing lately.
Tried to finish Christmas shopping last night - in the stores. Now I remember why I shop online.
Getting ready to finish up Christmas shopping. Attention shoppers: please be nice to me.
Mounds of laundry are depressing.
Here's a shocker. All the skinny people I 'follow' go to the gym everyday. Hmmm...maybe there's something to that!?! duh.
Up way too early preparing for grocery shopping. Ah, the life of a momma.
In other words, they're all working together!
Clint's theory: Easter bunny gives chocolate so your teeth rot. tooth fairy comes gives money for tooth. use money to buy Christmas gifts.
I refuse to ever stand in front of another camera. ever.
ugh...still up and hitting refresh to check on a flight BIL is on that keeps being delayed. Just. want. to. sleep. already.
Day one is done and it was a perfect one!
So on this new Momentum thing, they have given me 6 more points per day than before. How'my gonna fill all these?????
Could this headache REALLY be caused by eating healthy for like 10 hours? Is this sugar withdrawl already? What should I be expecting?
Ohmygosh. It's been 8 hours and I haven't cheated. I should have lost 80 lbs. by now, right? RIGHT??
Up and at 'em already, food planned and journaled ahead of time this morning for the entire day. VERY proud of myself for being prepared!
Finally getting to watch the DVR'd Biggest Loser Finale. I'm totally pulling for Michelle!!!!
Back from my first WW meeting. I am PEE-MY-PANTS-EXCITED!!!!
Just finished my 3 mile walk for the day. Walked by the church where the meeting is held, now I know I won't get lost. 2 hours to go.
*GAG* Chicken McNugget wedding cake *GAG*
5 hours and counting. SO excited that Melissa is also starting tonight!!! I think that these meetings are going to be successful!
I realized that in 24 hours I will be in my first WW meeting. Getting nervous. Any yays or nays on the new Momentum program from anyone?
Having one of those days where I truly believe that I will never be able to lose all this weight. I HATE that feeling.
It's almost 2 a.m. Why. Am. I. On. Twitter? Go to sleep ya freak!!
I feel very chatty but I don't have a bleeping thing to say!
Sleeping husband, good child next to me watching a movie, 2 screaming children in bedroom (friend sleeping over), and 'me' time. awesome!
Yesterdays' gorge-fest because of continuous grumbly tummy ended when I fell asleep last night. Todays looking much better!
Stuck watching Rocky marathon. The upside is, he DOES find some unique ways to work out.
Here's a tip: When the WW leader asks, 'What are some things we can do to handle emotions?' Don't raise your hand and answer 'medication'.
Just racked up over an hour again on the Wii Fit. I think I may need to buy the rechargeable doo-hickeys for the Fit board and remotes.
Lucked out first thing this morning. Walmart had ONE Wii Fit left. My amazing husband, jumped in the truck and got it for me!!!!!!!!!!!!
I just realized it's almost 1:00 a.m. only because there hasn't been one tweet in over 2 hours.
Weigh-in day after the Holidays. Down 0.2 lbs. It's a loss!
Woke up with headache GONE. That was miserable. Great day today cleaning, visiting, and most important, sticking to points and water.
The headaches I get when I stick to plan (I'm assuming from sugar withdrawl) are horrendous. Ironically, they make me want to eat.
Wii Sports is SO fun!!! Boxing, of course, my favorite. Going to get the Wii Fit tonight!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
